For the sundials example I had the following learning objective in mind:
  • Generate custom C code to inter-operate with 3rd party library (using e.g. Sundials' accessor C-macro: DENSE_ELEM(i, j))
  • Render said C code inside templates adapted to a 3rd party library (again Sundials is expecting function signatures with its own N_Vector among the arguments)
text:
For the sundials example I had the following learning objective in mind:
- Generate custom C code to inter-operate with 3rd party library (using e.g. Sundials' accessor C-macro: `DENSE_ELEM(i, j)`)
- Render said C code inside templates adapted to a 3rd party library (again Sundials is expecting function signatures with its own `N_Vector` among the arguments)
